title: LFM Plat 1 and above Ranked Team
body:
Looking for Diamond or plat 1 members to create a ranked team with, not playing super serious but mainly to improve.

Requirements: 
16 or above
Skype and a working headset
Available to play at least 4 days/nights a week
At least one main position and a backup position
Be able to accept their mistakes and take advice from others
No flamers/tilt lords

I will be our jungler/adc

If your keen add me in game.

Update: Currently got 6 members, need more members to fill in availability gaps. Being able to play most days is a must.

replies.body: ill add u after game diamond 5 atm mid or adc

Platinum 2???
Main support, Able to Skype, back up role top  
always free weekends, free mainly at night on weekdays.

Hi, I'm pretty much diamond or challenger but currently stuck in bronze cos of bad teams. we can ranked 5s for easy wins. Add me.

- thanks
